Member Function Documentation

DiarioPingback::init ( $  values  )  [protected]

Performs specialized initialization tasks.

Subclassers will use this method to perform custom initialization.

Note:
The default implementation simply does nothing.
Parameters:
values An array of column-value pairs to initialize the receiver.
